wxl 1"827 - 2013 iema;eïn¾ 06 jeks isl=rdod - 2013'09'06
^rcfha n,hmsg m%isoaO lrk ,§&
II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 1666
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
1665 - B 80763— 1,250 (2013/09)
D 1 -
    msgqj
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... ––
nQo,a kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
kS;s wOHdmk iNdfõ ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fkd;dßia ,ehsia;= ... ... ... ... —
úúO ±kaùï ... ... ... ... 1673
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
fuu .eiÜ m;%h  www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka  nd.; l< yel'
                  
       
              
               
            
        
                  
     
         
             
         
               
            
               
               
            
               
        
                 
        
              
               
            
         
                  
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00
g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla
olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj
ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j
lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2013 iema;eïn¾ ui 27 jeks Èk
m< lrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2013 iema;eïn¾ ui 13 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh
hq;= h'
 2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie,lsh hq;=h'˜
mS' tÉ' t,a' ù' o is,ajd"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s ^je' n'&
2013 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
ie' hq'- 2013'08'30 osk m< jQ wxl 1"826 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  III fldgi m< fkdùh'
ie' hq' -(i) úoHdj yd ;dlaIKh jeä ÈhqKq lsÍfï ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm; 2013 cQ,s ui 19 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§
ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha  II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'
(ii) j,afmd, mshdkkao wOHdmk iy ixialD;sl moku ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm; 2013 wf.daia;= ui 08 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld
m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha  II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2013'09'061666
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - kqjrt<sh
kqjrt<sh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha wjika ù we;s jir 05lg jvd merKs kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍug iQodkï fldg we;s w;r tu kvq wxl
my;ska olajd we;'
02' fuu kvqj,g wod< hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï fldgila fyda
kvqj,g f.dkqlr we;s hï ,shú,a,la fyda wem uqo,a ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï" ta i|yd b,a,Sula 2013'12'06 Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha
frðiag%d¾jrhd fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
03' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqjfyd;a my; i|yka ish¨u kvq jd¾;d 2013'12'06 jeks Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha § úkdY lrkq ,nk
nj fuhska oekqï fokq ,efí'
ta' ã' iS' tia' fyajdjiï"
ufyia;%d;a - kqjrt<sh'
2013 wf.daia;= ui 15 jeks Èk"
kqjrt<sh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha § h'

úúO oekaùï
Y%S ,xld ma,diaála iy rn¾ wdh;kh ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd
jQ mk;ls
lre chiQßh jk uu" Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha
md¾,sfïka;=fõ ia:djr ksfhda.j, wxl 48 ork ia:djr ksfhda.h
hgf;a —Y%S ,xld ma,diaála iy rn¾ wdh;kh ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd
jQ mk;ls˜ hkqfjka ye¢kafjk mk;a flgqïm;la md¾,sfïka;=fõ
§ bÈßm;a lsÍug woyia lrk nj fuhska oekqï foñ'
mk;a flgqïmf;a wruqK jkqfha my; i|yka fmdÿ mrud¾: j,ska
hqla; jkakd jQ tlS Y%S ,xld ma,diaála iy rn¾ wdh;kh ixia:d.;
lsÍuhs'
^w& fm!oa.,sl wxYh uÕska mj;ajdf.k hkq ,nk Y%S ,xldfõ
fmd,su¾ l¾udka;h kxjd,Su i|yd wOHdmkh" ld¾ñl
mqyqKqj" udkj iïm;a ixj¾Ok iemhSfuys ,d úYsIaghl=
f,i lghq;= lsÍu'
^wd& Y%S ,xld ma,diaála iy rn¾ wdh;kh úiska mj;ajkq ,nk
jevuq¿" iïuka;%K iy idlÉPdj,g iyNd.s ùfuka
fmd,su¾ l¾udka;fha  kshe,S isák wfkl=;a wdh;k iuÕ
iyiïnkaO;djfhka lghq;= lsÍug wjia:dj Wodlr §u"
hkdÈh fõ'
lre chiQßh"
md¾,sfïka;= uka;%S"
.ïmy Èia;%slalh'
09-28

<!-- page 10 -->

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2013'09'061674
.Kka fírd jid oeóu ms<sn| oekaùu
fld<U § meje;afjk niakdysr m<d;ano jdKsc
uydêlrKfha § h
tys ,shdmÈxÑ ld¾hd,h fld<U 04" fcdaY*a
f,aka ys wxl 28 ork ia:dkfha msysá gÉjqâ
bkafjiaÜukaÜia mSt,aiS ms<sn| ldrKh
iïnkaOjhs'
iy
2007 wxl 07 ork iud.ï mkf;a XII fldgi
hgf;a iy ta m%ldrj .re wêlrKh úiska
.Kka fírd jidoeóu i|yd jQ b,a,Su mss<sn|
ldrKh iïnkaOjhs'
l=rel=,wdrÉÑf.a fodka f,kd¾â m%shxl
kdkdhlaldr"
wxl 396$5" fldiaj;a; mdr" l,m¨jdj" rdc.sßh'
'''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
fm;aiïlre'
isú,a wêlrK n,h l%shd;aul lsÍu iïnkaOfhka fld<U§
meje;afjkq ,nk niakdysr m<d;a uydêlrKh úiska by; ku
